channel.title: I started a Micro-SaaS flavoured blog
channel.description:
I know, I know. It's 2017 and nobody is interested in blogs anymore. Too bad though. I just created one documenting my journey to starting a nice little side business. So far it's mostly about me picking bad business ideas and not following through with them, but hopefully I'll come across a good one that sparks my interest and is not doomed to fail right from the start.
The blog is over at www.lowestdefinition.com. Join me for the ride and if you'd like sign up for the newsletter, where I send out all the interesting resources I come across. If you have feedback, questions, anything: Write me a message, or drop me a mail. I'd love to hear from you.
Cheers, Philipp

item.title: I started a Micro-SaaS flavoured blog
item.dc:creator: Russell_Ballestrini
item.description:
Blogs are awesome, keep up the great work!

Read full topic
item.source: I started a Micro-SaaS flavoured blog

item.title: I started a Micro-SaaS flavoured blog
item.dc:creator: pheuberger
item.description:
Thanks a lot @unboot! Really happy to hear that
Yeah that’s definitely one of the reasons I started it.

The first failure was already a bit in the past and writing about it made me relive once again that the founder/market fit is really one of the most important aspects in this undertaking. So yeah, that’s now really ingrained into my brain

Read full topic
item.source: I started a Micro-SaaS flavoured blog

item.title: I started a Micro-SaaS flavoured blog
item.dc:creator: unboot
item.description:
@pheuberger Wish you success. I think your writing is good. And having a record of what you have tried will allow you to better look back and analyze your failures.
